filename:
//Blaast TCP output
bs;BlaastStack
c;CWrapper
s;SlirpInterface
io;ip_output
to;tcp_output
output:
//UDP Sending from PHONE to NETWORK depicted
$(purple:#9977ff)
group socket;Socket
  sorecvfrom
group end
 
group Udp
 //INCOMING to TCP
 udp_output#00bfff 
group end

group IPOutput
  ip_output$(purple)
group end 

group PhoneJava
  udpFromB8#00ffee
group end

group IF
  if_output$(purple) 
  if_start$(purple)
group end 

group b8;Temporary B8 routing
  handleIncomingNonFree#ffee00
group end

sorecvfrom>udp_output>ip_output>if_output>if_start>handleIncomingNonFree 
udpFromB8>ip_output
tcp:
$(red:#ff0000)
$(blue:#0000ff)
$(yellow:#ffff00)
 
shape box
closed$(red);CLOSED
closed_end$(red);closed\nBack to start
listen$(yellow);LISTEN
syn_received$(grey:#888888);SYN\nRECEIVED
syn_sent$(grey);SYN\nSENT
established#00ff00;ESTABLISHED\ndata xchange occurs

group PassiveClose$(lightblue:#afeeee);Passive CLOSE
  close_wait$(yellow);CLOSE WAIT
  last_ack$(yellow);LAST ACK
group end

group ActiveClose$(lightblue);Active CLOSE
  fin_wait1$(yellow);FIN WAIT 1
  closing$(yellow);CLOSING
  fin_wait2$(yellow);FIN WAIT 2
  time_wait$(yellow);TIME WAIT
group end

//unusual event
syn_sent.>closed;CLOSE/-
syn_sent.>syn_received;SYN/SYN+ACK\n(simultaneous open)
listen.>syn_sent;SEND/SYN
listen.>closed;CLOSE/-
syn_received.>listen;RST/-
syn_received.>fin_wait1;CLOSE/FIN
fin_wait1.>closing;FIN/ACK
fin_wait1.>time_wait;FIN+ACK/ACK
closing.>time_wait

// client / receiver path
closed>$(red)syn_sent;CONNECT/SYN(1/3 of 3w/hs)
syn_sent>$(red)established;SYN+ACK/ACK(3/3 of 3w/hs)
established>$(red)fin_wait1;CLOSE/FIN
fin_wait1>$(red)fin_wait2;ACK/-
fin_wait2>$(red)time_wait;FIN/ACK
time_wait>$(red)closed_end;Timeout

// server / sender path
closed>$(blue)listen;LISTEN/-
listen>$(blue)syn_received;SYN/SYN+ACK(2/3 of 3w/hs)
syn_received>$(blue)established;ACK/-
established>$(blue)close_wait;FIN/ACK
close_wait>$(blue)last_ack;CLOSE/FIN
last_ack>$(blue)closed_end
slirp:
//UDP Sending from PHONE to NETWORK depicted
group PhoneJava
  senddata#7777ff;Send data
group end

group IPInput
  ip_input$(purple:#9977ff)
  senddata>ip_input
group end 

group TcpInput
  tcp_input$(purple)
  shape diamond
  foundtcp#77ff77
  shape default
  tcp_input>foundtcp>connect
group end
  
group Icmp
  icmp_input$(purple)
  icmp_error$(purple)
group end

group Udp
  udp_input$(purple)
  findudp_so;Find UDP
  shape diamond
  foundudp#77ff77;Found
  udp_emu#77ff77
  shape default
  udpseen;seen
  udpnew;Create SO
  sosendto
  udp_input> findudp_so
  findudp_so>foundudp
  foundudp>udpnew,udpseen
  udpseen,udpnew>udp_emu
  udp_emu>sosendto
  sosendto>icmp_error
group end

group b8;Temporary B8 routing
 b8udpwrap#779999
 b8tcpwrap#779999
 udp_input>b8udpwrap;IF b8 traffic
 tcp_input>b8tcpwrap;IF b8 traffic
group end

ip_input>tcp_input,udp_input,icmp_input
slirp_mainloop:
start main_loop
ip_slowtimo;ip_slowtimo\nIP Timer process, free expired fragments
tcp_fasttimo;tcp_fasttimo\nProcess delayed ACKs
tcp_slowtimo;tcp_slowtimo\nper500ms\nupdate timers\nFSM actions
domainsockets;Read domain sockets\ncall ip_input
main_loop>initSelect>select>tcp_fasttimo>tcp_output>ip_slowtimo
ip_slowtimo>tcp_slowtimo>domainsockets 
domainsockets<>ip_input

group checkSocketsGroup
shape loopin
scansockets
shape default
scansockets>sorecvoob>tcp_connect>soread>ctcp_output>tcp_input>sowrite
shape loopout
checkSocketsDone
shape default
sowrite>checkSocketsDone 
group end

domainsockets>checkSocketsGroup 

checkSocketsDone>receiveUdpPackets>main_loop
slirp_incoming_udp:
//UDP Sending from PHONE to NETWORK depicted
$(purple:#9977ff)
group socket;Socket
  sorecvfrom
group end
 
group Udp
 //INCOMING to TCP
 udp_output#00bfff 
group end

group IPOutput
  ip_output$(purple)
group end 

group PhoneJava
  udpFromB8#00ffee
group end

group IF
  if_output$(purple)
  if_start$(purple)
group end 

group b8;Temporary B8 routing
  handleIncomingNonFree#ffee00
group end

sorecvfrom>udp_output>ip_output>if_output>if_start>handleIncomingNonFree 
udpFromB8>ip_output
ServerSetAlwaysOnVpn:
//Server allow VPN in WIFI
box se#00ff00;Server\nenable\nwifi
shape diamond euchanged;User has\nchanged setting
enchanged;User has NOT\nchanged setting
duchanged;User has\nchanged setting
dnchanged;User has NOT\nchanged setting
shape ellipse
DoNothing#00dddd;Do nothing
EnableFeature#dddd00;Turn on VPN on WIFI
DisableFeature#dd00dd;Turn off VPN on WIFI

//Regardless of the flag setting, user might have or might not have changed the setting
se>#0000ff"enabled"euchanged,enchanged>EnableFeature
se>#ff0000"disabled"duchanged,dnchanged>DisableFeature

euchanged>DoNothing
duchanged>DoNothing
